name: Yet another shmup
description:
A simple shoot'em up. The goal is to... shoot the enemies. Get the best score you can !

Also, Level0 is the only level finished. Level1 is not done yet, so currently it's just the fight with the Level0 boss instead ^^

Commands:

With a Keyboard:

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to shoot
  • Left control to slow down
  • Double tap on a direction to dash
  • Tab to change shooting pattern (you must get the bonuses first)

With an xbox controller:

  • Left joystick to move
  • A to shoot
  • B to slow down
  • Double tap on a direction to dash
  • L2 to change shooting pattern (you must get the bonuses first)

Commands can be changed in the menu to better suit your playstyle.

Menu Controls:

  • Arrows to choose
  • Enter to Select
  • Escape to Cancel

Resources:

Images:

The image of the player is from OpenGameArt, author is TheSource4Life:

https://opengameart.org/content/space-ships-side-scroller

Boss Music:
The boss music is also from OpenGameArt, author is nene:

https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-4-8-bit-re-upload

Anime Ace (https://www.dafont.com/anime-ace-bb.font)

Development:

Visual Studio Community (https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/fr/vs/community/)
